task.title: Submitting changes to the documentation
task.shortdesc: To make maintaining the documentation as easy as possible, changes get applied in a defined procedure. Please follow this procedure to make including your changes as quick and easy as possible.

step.cmd: Commit the changes on a separate branch
Push the branch to the GitHub Repository
Submit a Pull Request from your branch into the master branch
Create an Issue for adding new topics to a map if new topics were added in your changes
